original_text: They go across the hills. They stay at Geba for a night. The people in Ramah are afraid! The people in Gibeah of Saul run away.
korean_text: 산을 넘어 게바에서 유숙하매 라마는 떨고 사울의 기브아는 도망하도다

sentences.original_text: They stay at Geba for a night.
The people in Ramah are afraid!
The people in Gibeah of Saul run away.
